135.heading: Jimenez, Phil--Miscellanea.
135.title: "Wonder Girls
135.author: Lisa Kennedy
notes: "Lisa Kennedy reports that Wonder Woman is about to sort out a spat between tribe-crossed lesbian lovers, while the comic strip's current artist, Phil Jimenez, confesses a childhood fantasy to the superheroine herself."

136.heading: Jimenez, Phil--Miscellanea.
136.title: "Wonder Woman is Looking Pretty Good for 60"
136.author: by Hank Stuever
136.appears_in: p. D-3 in The Oakland Press, May 2, 2001.
notes: Washington Post article on Wonder Woman, with a photograph of current artist Phil Jimenez.

137.heading: Jimenez, Phil--Miscellanea.
137.title: "Young Mainstreamers: Making Distinctions"
137.author: by Ray Mescallado
137.appears_in: p. 111-113 in The Comics Journal, no. 205 (June 1998).
notes: Chooses new artists he thinks will become long-term favorites: John Cassaday, German Garcia, Oscar Jimenez, Phil Jimenez, and Jo Ladronn.
